W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK , MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
August 25, i960
PHONE WO 5 - 1221
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
l4 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
This Foundation's check for $36,327 macie payable to the
National Association of Educational Broadcasters is enclosed.
This is our payment for the second year for our new commitment
to your Association.
Your financial report states that you had a cash balance of
$472.58 on hand at the end of the last fiscal year (June 30,
i960). Your annual budget, which was approved in my letter of
January 30, 1959, addressed to you, totals $55,965, and your
original proposal indicates that you expect to receive $19,165
of this amount from other sources. Thus, the Foundation is to
supply $36,800 for your 196O-61 budget. Subtracting the cash
balance on hand of $472.58 at the beginning of this fiscal year
leaves a total of $36,327*42 as the Foundation's payment. In
order to simplify accounting procedures, we have made payment in
round figures.
Your certified financial statement and your program report
have been received. We are glad to note the progress which your
Association has made and the frank statements of problems which
it faces. We also note that this is the last year for your service
as president. May we again express to you our appreciation for
fine relationships, frank and honest dealings, and courageous
leadership.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
Maurice F. Seay
